name: PPong (OnlySlightly)
description:
Pong is now a contact sport!

Apply Newtonian physics to your paddle to slam and score your way to victory. All while your exploits are narrated by @mildmojo.

Are you the tinkering type? Great! Go into options and tinker with the physics to your hearts content.

It's best played with gamepads but if you must use keyboard don't worry!

You can use,

WASD for Right Paddle cardinal direction movement and CV to spin left and right

Up, Down, Left, and Right arrows for Left Paddle cardinal direction movement and , . to spin left and right.

Credit goes to @Mildmojo for voice acting and writing

and Jesse Valentine for the music!
